body_html:
Hi @gunan,
As you suggested , I tried removing the random seeds and running the test multiple times on ppc64le :
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/summary_image_op_test.py#L53
# np.random.seed(7)

$ bazel test -c opt tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test --runs_per_test=1000
INFO: Found 1 test target...
Target //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/summary_image_op_test
INFO: Elapsed time: 120.027s, Critical Path: 1.15s
//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test                   PASSED in 1.1s
  Stats over 1000 runs: max = 1.1s, min = 0.9s, avg = 0.9s, dev = 0.0s

Executed 1 out of 1 test: 1 test passes.

Thanks!

body:
Hi @gunan,
As you suggested , I tried removing the random seeds and running the test multiple times on ppc64le : 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/summary_image_op_test.py#L53
`# np.random.seed(7)`
```
$ bazel test -c opt tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test --runs_per_test=1000
INFO: Found 1 test target...
Target //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/summary_image_op_test
INFO: Elapsed time: 120.027s, Critical Path: 1.15s
//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test                   PASSED in 1.1s
  Stats over 1000 runs: max = 1.1s, min = 0.9s, avg = 0.9s, dev = 0.0s

Executed 1 out of 1 test: 1 test passes.
```

Thanks!
